===Etymology===
First recorded in a poem by {{w|Li Yi (poet)|Li Yi}} ({{w|Tang Dynasty}}). Compare the dialectal forms for "moon": {{zh-l|*月明|moon-bright}}, {{zh-l|*月光|moon-light}}.
